level.text: The rules of this chapter are adopted pursuant to the provisions of the Rental Housing Conversion and Sale Act of 1980 (D.C. Law 3-86).

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is § 501(a) of the Rental Housing Conversion and Sale Act, D.C. Law 3-86, § 501(a), D.C. Official Code § 42-3405.01(a) (2001); and Mayor’s Order 80-250, dated September 30, 1980.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 28 DCR 2443 (May 29, 1981), incorporating by reference the text of Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 28 DCR 694-712 (February 13, 1981).
